# count

**Instance Property**

The number of feature providers in this batch.

## Declaration

```swift
var count: Int { get }
```

## Accessing values

- **features(at:)**: Returns the feature provider at the given index.

items.description: Returns the feature provider at the given index.
items.name: features(at:)
